Description: The AWS region of your S3 bucket
S3 Bucket name. Just the name, no aws prefix neccesary.
ARN of an IAM role to assume
Output the value corresponding to this key, instead of the whole Fluent Bit record.
Fallback to whole record if key is missing from log. If set to false, an error will be recorded instead.
Time zone of the log source, so that local times (non-unix timestamps) are handled correctly.
